Package client.controller

Class ClientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.controller.ClientController

  • public class ClientController
extends java.lang.Object
    ClientController class controlls the communication between client view and client model

      • connectServer

        public int connectServer​(java.lang.String ip,
                         java.lang.String name,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Connects to the server
        Parameters:
        ip - Server IP address
        name - username
        password - password of the user
        Returns:
        true when the username and password are valid, otherwise return false

      • displayMsg

        public void displayMsg​(java.lang.String msg)
        Displays a message on the client window
        Parameters:
        msg - message to display on client window

      • sendIM

        public void sendIM​(java.lang.String msg,
                   java.lang.String rec)
        Method to send a message to a single recipient. This is the preferred method to use when sending a single message to another Client. Takes the raw input from the ClientWindow and adds details relevant to the server (e.g. sender, receiver, service code)
        Parameters:
        msg - The instant message intended to be sent to another User
        rec - The nickname of the intended User

      • sendGrpMsg

        public void sendGrpMsg​(java.lang.String msg,
                       java.lang.String rn)
        Method to send a message to a ChatRoom on the server.
        Parameters:
        msg - The message inteded to be sent to ChatRoom
        rn - The room number of the ChatRoom

      • sendMsg2Server

        public void sendMsg2Server​(java.lang.String s)
        Sends a message to the server
        Parameters:
        s - message being send to the server

      • addContact

        public void addContact​(java.lang.String contact)
        Adds contact to the Client contact list and appends the contact to the ClientWindow list
        Parameters:
        contact - A string containing the nickname of the contact to be added

      • updateContact

        public void updateContact​(java.lang.String contact,
                          boolean status)
        Updates the Client's contact list to reflect the online status of a contact and mirrors the result in ClientWindow list
        Parameters:
        contact - A string containing the nickname of the contact that has changed their online status
        status - A boolean that represents the online status of the Contact

      • sendChatRoomRegistration

        public void sendChatRoomRegistration​(java.lang.String reg)
        Method to send a ChatRoom registration the server.
        Parameters:
        reg - A string representing the participants list as inputed from the launchRegisterChatRoomWindow
